price: A ono što iz Knjige objavljujemo sušta je istina, ona potvrđuje da su istinite i one prije nje. – Allah, zaista, o robovima Svojim sve zna i On sve vidi.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ لَخَبِيرُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī awḥaynā ilayka mina al-kitābi huwa al-ḥaqu muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi inna al-laha biʿibādihi lakhabīrun baṣīrun
